text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 123038009 (Specimen)

This value set excludes codes based on the following rules:

  • Exclude these codes as defined in http://snomed.info/sct
    CodeDisplay
    123038009Specimen

name: SpecimenTypes
title: Specimen Types
publisher: National Resource Center for EHR Standards
description: This value set contains a set of SNOMED CT codes for Specimen Types
